org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.query
Class AeXPathQueryValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.query.AeXPathSyntaxValidator
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.query.AeXPathQueryValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jaxen.saxpath.XPathHandler
public class AeXPathQueryValidator
extends AeXPathSyntaxValidator

This class validates xpath queries against the types declared for their contexts.

Method Detail

validate

public void validate(IAeNamespaceContext aNamespaceContext,
                     java.lang.String aExpr,
                     org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.XMLType aContext,
                     javax.xml.namespace.QName aRoot)
              throws AeException
Call to perform validation. This is the main entry point for validation and can be called multiple times by a process to validate its queries. However this entry point is not reentrant and should only be called again after it returns.

Parameters:
aNamespaceContext -
aExpr -
aContext -
aRoot -
Throws:
AeException

findChild

protected boolean findChild(org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.ComplexType type,
                            java.lang.String prefix,
                            java.lang.String localName)
                     throws org.jaxen.saxpath.SAXPathException
Checks the schema model to see if the passed child element name is applicable for the current type. Note this is recursive as one schema group can be defined as extending another group and a type can have a base type.

Throws:
org.jaxen.saxpath.SAXPathException

findChild

protected boolean findChild(org.exolab.castor.xml.schema.ContentModelGroup group,
                            java.lang.String prefix,
                            java.lang.String localName)
                     throws org.jaxen.saxpath.SAXPathException
Checks the schema model to see if the passed child element name is applicable for the current level. Note this is recursive as one schema group can be defined as extending another group.

Throws:
org.jaxen.saxpath.SAXPathException
